question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. b. Civic Platform (PO)
raw_output:
I have a somewhat favorable opinion of Civic Platform (PO) because I believe they have shown competency in certain economic and governance issues, but I also have concerns about their policies and political approach, which makes my opinion neither very favorable nor very unfavorable. 

ANSWER: B
